hooks.command: echo '## Git Status' && git status -s 2>/dev/null | head -10 || echo 'Not a git repository'

echo '## Project Context' && echo && echo '### Git Status' && git status -s 2>/dev/null || echo 'Not a git repository' && echo && echo '### Recent Commits' && git log --oneline -5 2>/dev/null || true && echo && echo '### Project Structure' && find . -type f -name '*.json' -o -name '*.js' -o -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.py' -o -name '*.java' -o -name '*.go' | grep -E -v '(node_modules|.git|dist|build|target)' | head -20 || true

echo '## Project Overview' && echo && echo '### Tickets Status' && echo && echo '#### In Progress' && (find .memento/tickets/in-progress -name '*.md' 2>/dev/null | while read f; do echo "- $(basename "$f" .md)"; done || echo 'No tickets in progress') && echo && echo '#### Next' && echo "$(find .memento/tickets/next -name '*.md' 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' ') tickets" && echo && echo '#### Done' && echo "$(find .memento/tickets/done -name '*.md' 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' ') tickets"
